title: Jhin before Illaoi.
body: In the game of League of Legends designed by Riot Games, I Wolfinator have chosen to play a champ named Illaoi for quite some time. In this game, skins are released to change their design and give them an interesting change of lore/look. Since Illaoi was released in November 2015, I am displeased since a skin has not yet been designed for her and am showing that displeasure now.
